document_data.name: Feldrin Bloodfeathers
document_data.mainbody: '''Feldrin Bloodfeathers''' was the founder and first king of the realm of [[Damara]]. He lived during the 11{{th}} century [[DR]].

History.Life:
Feldrin hailed from [[Ravensburg]], the first settlement in what would become the lands of the Damaran [[Duchy of Carmathan]]. He was a nobleman of [[Sembia]]n heritage.

He was credited with founding the city of [[Heliogabalus]] in the {{YearlinkName|1075}}, and establishing it as the seat of his new Kingdom of Damara.
History.Legacy: Feldrin's lineage was much loved by the people of Damara, and his line ruled unbroken for nearly three hundred years. The last member of [[House Bloodfeathers]] died in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, when [[Virdin Bloodfeathers]] fell in battle with [[Zhengyi the Witch-King]], who then claimed the Damaran throne. By the time of the Witch-King's ouster two years later, only three direct descendants of Feldrin remained: [[Dimian Ree]], the Baron of [[Morov]]; [[Tranth]], the former Baron of [[Bloodstone (barony)|Bloodstone]]; and [[Christine Dragonsbane]], daughter of Tranth and wife to the then-Baron of Bloodstone, [[Gareth Dragonsbane]].
